text: The command position is a spot in the bedroom that provides a clear view of the door and entire room, but not directly in line with the door.
Apply symmetry to: Create balanced energy in your bedroom. Create equality and harmony in a relationship, if the bedroom is shared by two partners.

Feng shui is rooted in chi, a vital life force energy that flows through you and everything around you. Certain objects and their position promotes good chi. Mirror placement can boost positive chi by reflecting and “doubling” in abundance what is in front of them – a picturesque view, natural light, etc.
The earth element in feng shui is believed to bring stability and grounding energy to the bedroom. Incorporate the earth element with natural materials and clay / terracotta.
